main: ^Welcome to the tutorial of the game. You can press Enter to continue to the dialogue.
^Now you can use the arrow keys or WASD to select a choice and press enter to choose it.
Continuation: ^Now we can move onto movement. You can use the arrow keys or WASD to move your character. You can also hold left shift to run. Try walking towards the NPC.
^If you are close enough to the NPC, a visual cue on the bottom left should show up telling you how to interact with the NPC.
